name: Rainforest Game
description:
This is the game I made to further clarify my youtube video(link below).

It's a short game about the catastrophic events that would have happened if the Amazon fires would continue. It starts with how it looks in some places now, green but still pretty barren. If you walk forward then you'll see a ash landscape after the fires. and after that its just a desert. If you take a right turn in the beginning you will see a forest as it was 100 years ago.
